Corporate Training Services

  • Home
  • Corporate Training Services

Corporate Training Services That Improve  Performance and Retention

With over 30 years of experience, TrainSMART delivers results-driven corporate training services designed to improve workforce performance, enhance employee retention, and align learning with business goals. From on-the-job training to custom onboarding and performance-based programs, our services are tailored to your company’s unique needs.

We serve organizations of all sizes—from high-growth startups to global enterprises—offering scalable, flexible training solutions that fit your workforce, culture, and objectives.

Global Training Delivery Solutions

Are you struggling to deliver consistent, high-quality training across multiple regions? Do you need a reliable partner to outsource training delivery and ensure seamless execution worldwide? TrainSMART’s global training delivery solutions provide organizations with scalable, customized programs that adapt to local cultures, languages, and business goals.

  • Global Training Delivery Solutions

Deliverables:

  • Strategic plan for managing large-scale, multi-country training rollouts
  • Access to TrainSMART’s global network of certified facilitators
  • Localization and translation of training content for international audiences
  • Pre- and post-assessments, Level 1 & Level 2 evaluations, and reporting dashboards
  • End-to-end project management for global training initiatives

Implementing On-the-Job Training

Are you considering implementing/expanding on-the-job training in your organization? Do your employees spend too much time in classroom training? Do you need more flexibility in your training program? This service enables clients to implement an on-the-job training program or expand/enhance an existing one.

  • On-the-Job-Training

Deliverables:

  • Design and implementation of an on-the-job training program.
  • Design and development of on-the-job training materials.
  • Strategic plan for implementing an on-the-job training program.
  • Evaluation report of a current on-the-job training program.

Implementing Employee Orientation / Onboarding?

Do you have a high turnover? Are new employees leaving before their probationary period has ended? Do you need to make new employees more productive quicker? Do new employees diminish the productivity of experienced personnel? This service seeks to enhance the acculturation and productivity of new employees in your organization.

  • Employee Orientation / Onboarding

Deliverables:

  • Report recommending enhancements to employee orientation/new hire training program.
  • Hard/electronic copies of employee orientation/new hire training materials.

Establishing and Aligning the Training Function

Are you considering formally establishing a training or organizational learning function within your organization? Perhaps you wish to better align your training/organizational learning function with the company’s business goals and objectives. Or, you may be considering the consolidation of a decentralized training operation. If so, either or both of these services will help you accomplish your objective.

  • Establishing a Training Function
  • Employee Training Plan Development

Deliverables:

  • An operational training department, including policies, procedures, strategic plan, etc.
  • 12-24 month plan outlining and prioritizing specific training projects.

Enhancing the Effectiveness of Your Training Function

Would you like to increase the learning efficiency and/or cost-effectiveness of your current training program(s)? If so, these services are designed to help you find solutions to your concerns.

  • Training Department Audit
  • Training Program Audit

Deliverable:

  • Report highlighting the strengths/weaknesses of the training department/program with relevant recommendations for action.

Performance Problems – Developing Customized Training

Are you experiencing performance problems somewhere in your organization? Whether they are company-wide, divisional/departmental, or individual, our services are designed to identify the source of the problem and recommend effective solutions. If you are looking for the design, development, or evaluation of proprietary training curricula/courses for your business, our design processes and expertise will meet your needs.

  • Employee Performance Analysis
  • Organizational Training Needs Assessment

Deliverables:

  • Report describing findings with recommendations for addressing issues and concerns.
  • Hard/electronic copies of training materials; an evaluation report describing strengths and weaknesses of the training program/course with recommendations for improvement.

Supporting Blog Posts

How To Create A Training Budget That Aligns With Business Goals

Frequently Asked Questions

What types of corporate training services does TrainSMART offer?

TrainSMART offers a wide range of customized training services including on-the-job training implementation, new employee onboarding, training audits, employee performance improvement, and establishing internal training functions aligned with business goals.

Can you help us improve or expand an existing training program?

Yes. We can evaluate your current training programs, identify strengths and gaps, and provide recommendations and deliverables to enhance efficiency, engagement, and learning outcomes.

What industries does TrainSMART serve?

TrainSMART works with startups, mid-sized companies, and Fortune 500 enterprises across various industries including healthcare, manufacturing, technology, government, education, and financial services.

How does on-the-job training benefit our organization?

On-the-job training reduces time spent in classrooms, improves learning retention, and allows employees to acquire skills directly in the workflow. It’s especially effective for roles requiring hands-on or role-specific knowledge.

Can TrainSMART set up an in-house training department?

Absolutely. We help organizations establish and structure their internal training or learning function, including developing strategic plans, policies, procedures, and a 12–24 month project roadmap.

What’s included in a training program audit?

Our training program audit includes a comprehensive evaluation of your current training materials, delivery methods, and outcomes—along with a detailed report featuring strengths, weaknesses, and actionable recommendations.

How does customized training solve performance problems?

We conduct employee performance analysis and training needs assessments to identify the root causes of underperformance. Then we design and deliver targeted learning solutions that address skill gaps and improve job outcomes.

Is TrainSMART’s training available globally?

Yes. We offer both in-person and virtual solutions with facilitators across the globe. Our programs can be delivered consistently across multiple locations and adapted for cultural and regional relevance.

Client Success Story

“TrainSmart really helped me out when a program went south. The instructional designers were able to create a beautiful, relative, meaningful training program that impressed managers and provided staff the knowledge transfer desired.”

Ready To Build A Smarter Workforce

Contact TrainSMART to learn how our custom corporate training services can enhance your organization’s performance and help your team succeed. Our experts are ready to develop a tailored solution for your specific needs.

    Training & Development Solutions You Can Trust

    SPEAK WITH AN EXPERT

    Toll Free: 1-800-807-8030
    inquiries@trainsmartinc.com
